comments.raw_text:
The sync alerts dashboard needs to be updated to use bigquery: https://sql.telemetry.mozilla.org/dashboard/sync-alerts

This seems to be a good use case for higher level metric monitoring that we can learn some things from to use in general monitoring/alerting cases.  e.g. setting dynamic thresholds, using redash for pipeline monitoring
comments.author: bewu@mozilla.com
